name: oTabsJS v1.2.1
tagline: Create ordered tabbed content in HTML
body:
This simple Javascript library has been created as a simple solution when you need to display tabbed content in the same order of a list. It is meant to speed up the html markup process and avoid list-content reference errors. ##Installation Simply include the js file (or minified js) in your html: ```html ``` ##How to use In your html create a list with this template: ```html

``` And then use this template where you want your tabbed content to appear: ```html
